message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering purchasing our product. We're excited to discuss the details with you. Our initial offer is $1200000 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. I am interested in discussing a more reasonable price. My counteroffer is $900000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your interest in the product. After careful consideration, we are willing to meet you halfway. Our counteroffer is $1100000 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $1000000 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. We're getting close, but we still need to ensure we're getting a fair price for the product. We're willing to compromise again. Our counteroffer is $1050000 for the product.
Thank you for your continued flexibility, Alice. Considering my financial constraints, I would like to propose a final offer of $1025000 for the product.

Thank you for your final offer, Bob. We're still not quite there, but we're willing to make one more concession. Our counteroffer is $1050000 for the product, which is the same as our previous offer. We're willing to meet you halfway, but we can't go any lower.
